mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume (uid, `name`, gender, age, skills, workExperience, description, jobPreference) VALUES (#{uid}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{skills}, #{workExperience}, #{description}, #{jobPreference})
mapper.update: UPDATE resume SET `name` = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, skills = #{skills}, workExperience = #{workExperience}, description = #{description}, jobPreference = #{jobPreference} WHERE uid = #{uid}
